name: WKInterfaceDate
desc: A label that displays the current date or time.

items.name: func setTextColor(UIColor?)
items.desc: Sets the color of the date and time text.

items.name: func setTimeZone(TimeZone?)
items.desc: Sets the time zone to use when displaying time information.

items.name: func setCalendar(Calendar?)
items.desc: Sets the calendar to use when formatting date information.
